name: consistent-observable
description: Little framework for simplifying reaction to values changing over time.

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:all: parallelshell 'npm run build' 'npm run build:test' && echo '✔ all success'
scripts.test:prepare: npm run clean && npm run build:all
scripts.test: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:only
scripts.test:pretty: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:only:pretty
scripts.coverage: npm run test:prepare && npm run coverage:only
scripts.coverage:pretty: npm run test:prepare && npm run coverage:only:pretty
scripts.install-dependencies: shx mv npm-shrinkwrap.json npm-shrinkwrap.no-dev.json && shx cp npm-shrinkwrap.dev.json npm-shrinkwrap.json && npm install && npm prune && shx mv npm-shrinkwrap.no-dev.json npm-shrinkwrap.json
scripts.update-dependencies: shx mv npm-shrinkwrap.json npm-shrinkwrap.no-dev.json && ncu -u && shx rm -rf node_modules && npm install --only=prod && npm prune --production && npm shrinkwrap && npm install && npm prune && shx mv npm-shrinkwrap.json npm-shrinkwrap.no-dev.json && npm shrinkwrap --dev && shx mv npm-shrinkwrap.json npm-shrinkwrap.dev.json && shx mv npm-shrinkwrap.no-dev.json npm-shrinkwrap.json
scripts.validate: npm run install-dependencies && parallelshell 'npm run lint' 'npm run test' && echo '✔ all success'
scripts.validate:pretty: parallelshell 'npm run lint' 'npm run test:pretty' && echo '✔ all success\a' || (echo '✘ some error\a'; sleep 0.2; echo '\a')
scripts.check: parallelshell 'npm run audit' 'npm outdated --depth 0' && echo '✔ all success'
scripts.prepare: npm run validate && npm run check && echo '✔ all success'
scripts.preversion: npm run prepare && git diff && node -e "let rl = require('readline').createInterface({input: process.stdin, output: process.stdout}); rl.question('Ok? (type yes) ', (answer) => process.exit(answer === 'yes' ? 0 : 1))"
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
